hooks.name: edit_post
hooks.description: Fires once an existing post has been updated.

hooks.name: post_row_actions
hooks.description: Filters the array of row action links on the Posts list table.

hooks.name: wp_redirect_status
hooks.description: Filters the redirect HTTP response status code to use.

hooks.name: comment_reply_link
hooks.description: Filters the comment reply link.

hooks.description: Fires once the Ajax request has been validated or not.

hooks.name: the_time
hooks.description: Filters the time of the post, for display.

hooks.name: widget_archives_dropdown_args
hooks.description: Filters the arguments for the Archives widget drop-down.

hooks.name: unspam_comment
hooks.description: Fires immediately before a comment is unmarked as Spam.

hooks.name: comment_form
hooks.description: Fires at the bottom of the comment form, inside the closing form tag.

hooks.name: user_contactmethods
hooks.description: Filters the user contact methods.

hooks.name: wp_list_categories
hooks.description: Filters the HTML output of a taxonomy list.

hooks.description: Filters slashed post data just before it is inserted into the database.

hooks.name: user_register
hooks.description: Fires immediately after a new user is registered.

hooks.name: post_link
hooks.description: Filters the permalink for a post.

hooks.name: theme_root_uri
hooks.description: Filters the URI for themes directory.

hooks.name: comment_text
hooks.description: Filters the text of a comment to be displayed.

hooks.description: Prints admin screen notices.

hooks.description: Fires after the object term cache has been cleaned.

hooks.name: feed_link
hooks.description: Filters the feed type permalink.

hooks.description: Fires in the login page header after scripts are enqueued.

hooks.description: Fires after a post type is registered.

hooks.description: Filters the OPML outline link title text.

hooks.name: the_category
hooks.description: Filters the category or list of categories.

hooks.name: posts_results
hooks.description: Filters the raw post results array, prior to status checks.

hooks.name: wp_footer
hooks.description: Prints scripts or data before the closing body tag on the front end.

hooks.name: pre_user_query
hooks.description: Fires after the WP_User_Query has been parsed, and before the query is executed.

hooks.name: get_the_modified_date

hooks.name: pre_comment_user_agent

hooks.description: Fires before the Edit Tag form.

hooks.description: Fires before a link is deleted.

hooks.description: Fires at the beginning of the content section in an admin page.

hooks.name: wp_save_image_file

hooks.description: Fires immediately before an option is deleted.

hooks.name: the_post
hooks.description: Fires once the post data has been set up.

hooks.name: wp_generate_attachment_metadata
hooks.description: Filters the generated attachment meta data.

hooks.name: get_users_drafts
hooks.description: Filters the SQL query string for the user’s drafts query.

hooks.name: wp_default_styles
hooks.description: Fires when the WP_Styles instance is initialized.

hooks.name: edit_term_taxonomy
hooks.description: Fires immediate before a term-taxonomy relationship is updated.

hooks.name: admin_email_confirm_form
hooks.description: Fires inside the admin-email-confirm-form form tags, before the hidden fields.

hooks.name: admin_print_scripts-{$hook_suffix}
hooks.description: Fires when scripts are printed for a specific admin page based on $hook_suffix.

hooks.name: wp
hooks.description: Fires once the WordPress environment has been set up.

hooks.name: attribute_escape
hooks.description: Filters a string cleaned and escaped for output in an HTML attribute.

hooks.name: pre_user_id
hooks.description: Filters the comment author’s user ID before it is set.

hooks.name: widget_pages_args
hooks.description: Filters the arguments for the Pages widget.

hooks.name: wp_insert_comment
hooks.description: Fires immediately after a comment is inserted into the database.

hooks.name: welcome_panel
hooks.description: Fires when adding content to the welcome panel on the admin dashboard.

hooks.name: media_upload_tabs
hooks.description: Filters the available tabs in the legacy (pre-3.5.0) media popup.

hooks.name: locale_stylesheet_uri
hooks.description: Filters the localized stylesheet URI.

hooks.name: after_switch_theme
hooks.description: Fires on the next WP load after the theme has been switched.

hooks.name: admin_head
hooks.description: Fires in head section for all admin pages.

hooks.name: customize_register
hooks.description: Fires once WordPress has loaded, allowing scripts and styles to be initialized.

hooks.name: edit_terms
hooks.description: Fires immediately before the given terms are edited.

hooks.name: post_submitbox_misc_actions
hooks.description: Fires after the post time/date setting in the Publish meta box.

hooks.name: get_header
hooks.description: Fires before the header template file is loaded.

hooks.name: admin_email_confirm
hooks.description: Fires before the admin email confirm form.

hooks.name: edited_term_taxonomies
hooks.description: Fires immediately after a term to delete’s children are reassigned a parent.

hooks.name: comment_on_draft
hooks.description: Fires when a comment is attempted on a post in draft mode.

hooks.name: the_password_form
hooks.description: Filters the HTML output for the protected post password form.

hooks.name: media_view_settings
hooks.description: Filters the media view settings.

hooks.name: get_the_time
hooks.description: Filters the time of the post.

hooks.name: wp_mail_from_name
hooks.description: Filters the name to associate with the “from” email address.

hooks.name: sanitize_key
hooks.description: Filters a sanitized key string.

hooks.name: set-screen-option
hooks.description: Filters a screen option value before it is set.

hooks.name: xmlrpc_publish_post
hooks.description: Fires when _publish_post_hook()  is called during an XML-RPC request.

hooks.name: resetpass_form
hooks.description: Fires following the ‘Strength indicator’ meter in the user password reset form.

hooks.name: login_header
hooks.description: Fires in the login page header after the body tag is opened.

hooks.name: wp_dropdown_cats
hooks.description: Filters the taxonomy drop-down output.

hooks.name: manage_media_custom_column
hooks.description: Fires for each custom column in the Media list table.

hooks.name: dbx_post_sidebar
hooks.description: Fires after all meta box sections have been output, before the closing #post-body div.

hooks.name: do_feed_{$feed}
hooks.description: Fires once the given feed is loaded.

hooks.name: tiny_mce_before_init
hooks.description: Filters the TinyMCE config before init.

hooks.name: rdf_ns
hooks.description: Fires at the end of the feed root to add namespaces.

hooks.name: get_meta_sql
hooks.description: Filters the meta query’s generated SQL.

hooks.name: edit_page_form
hooks.description: Fires after ‘normal’ context meta boxes have been output for the ‘page’ post type.

hooks.name: user_admin_menu
hooks.description: Fires before the administration menu loads in the User Admin.

hooks.name: get_the_modified_time
hooks.description: Filters the localized time a post was last modified.

hooks.name: get_ancestors
hooks.description: Filters a given object’s ancestors.

hooks.description: Fires at the end of the Edit Term form for all taxonomies.

hooks.description: Filters the attachment data prepared for JavaScript.

hooks.name: comment_author
hooks.description: Filters the comment author’s name for display.

hooks.name: post_rewrite_rules
hooks.description: Filters rewrite rules used for “post” archives.

hooks.description: Fires before a particular screen is loaded.

hooks.name: wp_image_editors
hooks.description: Filters the list of image editing library classes.

hooks.description: Filters a comment’s data before it is sanitized and inserted into the database.

hooks.name: the_date
hooks.description: Filters the date of the post, for display.

hooks.name: loop_start
hooks.description: Fires once the loop is started.

hooks.name: get_image_tag_class
hooks.description: Filters the value of the attachment’s image tag class attribute.

hooks.name: loop_end
hooks.description: Fires once the loop has ended.

hooks.name: manage_link_custom_column
hooks.description: Fires for each registered custom link column.

hooks.description: Fires when the WP_Scripts instance is initialized.

hooks.description: Fires once all query variables for the current request have been parsed.

hooks.name: pre_user_nicename
hooks.description: Filters a user’s nicename before the user is created or updated.

hooks.name: admin_xml_ns
hooks.description: Fires inside the HTML tag in the admin header.

hooks.name: pre_user_description
hooks.description: Filters a user’s description before the user is created or updated.

hooks.description: Filters the cron request arguments.

hooks.name: attachment_fields_to_save
hooks.description: Filters the attachment fields to be saved.

hooks.name: all_plugins
hooks.description: Filters the full array of plugins to list in the Plugins list table.

hooks.name: theme_root
hooks.description: Filters the absolute path to the themes directory.

hooks.name: set_current_user
hooks.description: Fires after the current user is set.

hooks.description: Filters rewrite rules used for comment feed archives.

hooks.description: Fires at the end of the RSS2 Feed Header.

hooks.name: the_excerpt_rss

hooks.description: Filters the full set of generated rewrite rules.

hooks.description: Enables the legacy ‘Site visibility’ privacy options.

hooks.description: Fires once a post has been saved.

hooks.description: Fires when the login form is initialized.

hooks.description: Filters the locale ID of the WordPress installation.

hooks.description: Fires before the password and confirm password fields are checked for congruity.

hooks.name: save_post

hooks.description: Filters a user’s email before the user is created or updated.

hooks.description: Filters the stylesheet directory path for the active theme.

hooks.name: rss2_ns
hooks.description: Fires at the end of the RSS root to add namespaces.

hooks.name: stylesheet_directory_uri
hooks.description: Filters the stylesheet directory URI.

hooks.name: updated_{$meta_type}_meta
hooks.description: Fires immediately after updating metadata of a specific type.

hooks.name: manage_users_custom_column
hooks.description: Filters the display output of custom columns in the Users list table.

hooks.name: admin_print_styles
hooks.description: Fires when styles are printed for all admin pages.

hooks.name: the_content_feed
hooks.description: Filters the post content for use in feeds.

hooks.name: comment_{$old_status}_to_{$new_status}
hooks.description: Fires when the comment status is in transition from one specific status to another.

hooks.name: comment_flood_filter
hooks.description: Filters the comment flood status.

hooks.name: menu_order
hooks.description: Filters the order of administration menu items.

hooks.name: edit_term_taxonomies
hooks.description: Fires immediately before a term to delete’s children are reassigned a parent.

hooks.name: login_headerurl
hooks.description: Filters link URL of the header logo above login form.

hooks.name: auth_cookie_malformed
hooks.description: Fires if an authentication cookie is malformed.

hooks.name: image_save_pre
hooks.description: Filters the GD image resource to be streamed to the browser.

hooks.name: activity_box_end
hooks.description: Fires at the end of the ‘At a Glance’ dashboard widget.

hooks.name: delete_term
hooks.description: Fires after a term is deleted from the database and the cache is cleaned.

hooks.name: single_cat_title
hooks.description: Filters the category archive page title.

hooks.name: allowed_redirect_hosts
hooks.description: Filters the list of allowed hosts to redirect to.

hooks.name: user_admin_notices
hooks.description: Prints user admin screen notices.

hooks.name: media_row_actions
hooks.description: Filters the action links for each attachment in the Media list table.

hooks.name: untrash_post
hooks.description: Fires before a post is restored from the Trash.

hooks.name: create_{$taxonomy}
hooks.description: Fires after a new term is created for a specific taxonomy.

hooks.name: comment_flood_trigger
hooks.description: Fires before the comment flood message is triggered.

hooks.name: wp_admin_bar_class
hooks.description: Filters the admin bar class to instantiate.

hooks.name: pre_comment_author_email
hooks.description: Filters the comment author’s email cookie before it is set.

hooks.name: spam_comment
hooks.description: Fires immediately before a comment is marked as Spam.

hooks.name: wp_nav_menu_items
hooks.description: Filters the HTML list content for navigation menus.

hooks.name: network_admin_menu
hooks.description: Fires before the administration menu loads in the Network Admin.

hooks.name: wp_terms_checklist_args
hooks.description: Filters the taxonomy terms checklist arguments.

hooks.name: wp_get_attachment_url
hooks.description: Filters the attachment URL.

hooks.name: search_rewrite_rules
hooks.description: Filters rewrite rules used for search archives.

hooks.name: user_can_richedit
hooks.description: Filters whether the user can access the visual editor.

hooks.name: sidebar_admin_page
hooks.description: Fires after the available widgets and sidebars have loaded, before the admin footer.

hooks.name: request
hooks.description: Filters the array of parsed query variables.

hooks.name: admin_enqueue_scripts
hooks.description: Fires when enqueuing scripts for all admin pages.

hooks.name: comment_url
hooks.description: Filters the comment author’s URL for display.

hooks.name: authenticate
hooks.description: Filters whether a set of user login credentials are valid.
